data.title: Liberty Nationals Wrestling Tournament 2016
data.text: Really nice place to have a tournament. The staff working the tournament were helpful and kind from the ticket workers to the food vendors. Facilities were kept clean through out the event. Security was through and sharp. Would highly recommend this venue for your events....

data.title: Small Convention Center
data.text: Sad that St. Joseph had an incredible three story auditorium that was torn down years ago with ever star from 100 years ago to the 1980s appeared there. Someone said that more stars appeared there, than there were stars in heaven. New Center is just another small multi purpose builkding that gets used on occassions. Don't waste your time, unless you are here and really bored on trhe weekend, and if that is the case, get on 29 northbound and get off and check out Squaw Creek Game Reserve..Eagles...Lots of Bald Eagles, and deer

data.title: Nice Park
data.text: We walked from our B&B down to this park.  There is a small Veterans memorial there, and a mini statue of liberty.
